participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Reflective and passionate about storytelling, with a desire to connect through her writing.
participant_1.background: I want to become an author. After finishing my career I discovered that I am not that passionate about it. I am currently unemployed so I have time to write. I am a professional translator. I am writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and eager to explore new ideas and experiences, with a hint of rebellion.
participant_2.background: I am about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon. I go to a Catholic high school in New England. I plan to raise hell and sow my wild oats.

content.text: I'm a writer, too! What kind of things do you like to write about?
I'm not sure yet! I'm excited to experiment with different genres and see what I like.
That's great! I'm sure you'll find your way.
Thanks! I'm also excited to meet new people who are interested in writing.
Me too! I've met some really cool people through writing.
I'm sure I will too! I'm looking forward to college.
Me too! It's a great time to be young and explore the world.
I know! I'm excited to learn new things and experience new things.
Me too! I'm sure you'll have a blast.
What are you looking forward to the most about college?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people, learning new things, and having a lot of fun.
Me too! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
